page.title: 13A NEW TOWN RESIDENT
page.content: THE RESIDENT BEGINS EVERYDAY BY MAKING BREAKFAST FOR 6 PEOPLE IN HER FAMILY. SHE THEN GOES TO WORK IN A LOCAL PRIMARY SCHOOL WHERE SHE IS A CLASS TEACHER. SHE WORKS FROM 8.30_5.00PM. AFTER SCHOOL SHE GOES HOME AND COOKS FOR THE FAMILY, WASHES UP, DOES OTHER JOBS AROUND THE HOUSE. THEN SHE PUTS THE YOUNGEST CHILD TO BED. SHE MAY THEN HAVE SOME MARKING OF SCHOOL WORK TO DO OR SHE MAY HAVE TO COOK LATER FOR SOME OF HER OLDER CHILDREN BEFORE HAVING A BATH AND GOING TO BED WITH A BOOK. LEISURE TIME IS BRIEF AND IS SPENT READING, GARDENING OR SEEING FRIENDS. SHE SHOPS LOCALLY FOR FOOD AND HOUSEHOLD GOODS.
